function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of privacy protection for individuals' purchasing and movement data","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strong data protection regulations and encryption techniques, obtain explicit consent from individuals for data collection","Technologies":"Encryption, secure data storage, anonymization techniques","People":"Residents, consumers, tourists","Owner":"Data collectors, government regulators"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through crowded retail spaces and transport hubs","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in urban areas","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, use contactless payment methods, improve ventilation systems","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, air purifiers, ventilation monitoring systems","People":"Retail workers, commuters, tourists","Owner":"Retailers, transport authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Risk of economic instability and disparity in neighborhoods due to post-pandemic contractions","Impact":"Increased unemployment, reduced purchasing power, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Provide targeted financial support, skills training, and community development programs","Technologies":"Economic modeling software, job market analysis tools","People":"Residents, entrepreneurs, workers","Owner":"Community organizations, government agencies"}]}
